---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

18884 * 1 or -1 or 0



   +       0     -
[ 49C4 , 0000, B63C, ..... ] 



0000100010000100 POSITIVE
0000000000000000 ZERO
1000000000000000 NEGATIVE
0000100010000100 POSITIVE
0000000000000000 ZERO
1000000000000000 NEGATIVE
0000000000000000 ZERO 
0000000000000000 ZERO


00101 - RS2
R5 gets 2^ in its slices

LI R1 with 0000000000000000 at index  0 - 000


LI R1 with 0000000000000000 at index  1- XXX


LI R1 with 1000000000000000 at index  2- XXX


LI R1 with 0000000000000000 at index  3- XXX


LI R1 with 0000100010000100 at index  4- XXX


LI R1 with 1000000000000000 at index  5- XXX


LI R1 with 0000000000000000 at index  6- XXX


LI R1 with 0000100010000100 at index  7 - XXX




00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.


LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 6 - 110
LI R5 with 0100100111000100 at index 7 - 111



 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode

1100001010001010000100000

program: 

0000000000000000000000101  
0001000000000000000000101   
0010100000000000000000101  
0011000000000000000000101   
0100000010001000010000101  
0101100000000000000000101  
0110000000000000000000101  
0111000010001000010000101  
0000010010011100010000001  
0001010010011100010000001 
0010010010011100010000001  
0011010010011100010000001  
0100010010011100010000001  
0101010010011100010000001  
0110010010011100010000001  
0111010010011100010000001

passes.
